1	# test-project
     2	
     3	A monorepo project with Next.js frontend and WebSocket services, featuring Claude AI integration and authentication.
     4	
     5	## Setup
     6	
     7	1. **Install dependencies**
     8	
     9	```bash
    10	pnpm install
    11	```
    12	
    13	2. **Environment Configuration**
    14	
    15	You need to setup environment variables in a few packages. In most of these, you can just copy the `.env.example` file and rename it to `.env.development.local` (except for the `broadcast` package, which needs a `.env` file).
    16	
    17	# Set things up in this order (follow their README.md)
    18	
    19	- packages/dev-env
    20	- packages/shared
    21	- apps/broadcast
    22	- apps/www
    23	
    24	3. **Start Development**
    25	
    26	```bash
    27	pnpm dev
    28	```
    29	
    30	## Key Features
    31	
    32	- **AI-Powered PRs & Commits**: Automatically generates conventional commit messages and structured PR descriptions using AI
    33	- **Claude Integration**: Full Claude AI chat interface with tool support
    34	- **Code Sandboxes**: Integrated CodeSandbox environments for safe code execution
    35	- **GitHub Integration**: OAuth authentication and repository management
    36	- **Real-time Communication**: WebSocket-based real-time features
    37	
    38	## Documentation
    39	
    40	For detailed setup and usage instructions, see [CLAUDE.md](./CLAUDE.md).
    41

1	{
     2	  "name": "test-project",
     3	  "version": "1.0.0",
     4	  "private": true,
     5	  "description": "",
     6	  "scripts": {
     7	    "dev": "concurrently -n \"env,www,cron,wss,daemon,daemon-bundled\" \"pnpm -C packages/dev-env dev\" \"pnpm -C apps/www dev\" \"pnpm -C apps/www dev:cron\" \"pnpm -C apps/broadcast dev\" \"pnpm -C packages/daemon dev\" \"pnpm -C packages/daemon-bundled dev\"",
     8	    "tsc-watch": "concurrently -n \"www,shared,broadcast,daemon,daemon-bundled\" \"pnpm -C apps/www tsc-watch\" \"pnpm -C packages/shared tsc-watch\" \"pnpm -C apps/broadcast tsc-watch\" \"pnpm -C packages/daemon tsc-watch\""
     9	  },
    10	  "keywords": [],
